scripts.prepare: node -e "process.cwd() !== require('path').resolve(__dirname) && process.exit(1)" || node -e "require('child_process').exec('npm -v', (error, stdout) => Number(stdout.split('.').shift()) >= 7 && process.exit(1))" || echo "==> PREPARE <==" && exit 0
scripts.prepack: node -e "require('child_process').exec('npm -v', (error, stdout) => Number(stdout.split('.').shift()) <= 6 && process.exit(1))" || echo "==> PREPACK <==" && exit 0
